title: Sir George Nevill, Lord Bergavenny
provenance_text:
Possibly the Wotton family, Boughton Malherbe (a member of the Wotton family married a daughter of the sitter, 3rd Lord Bergavenny); Thomas, Lord Wotton and by descent to his daughter Katherine who married Henry, Lord Stanhope in 1628; by descent in the Stanhope family to the Earl of Stanhope, Chevening, Kent (the preceding provenance according to copies of Duveen documents and correspondence in curatorial files); Frank T. Sabin, London dealer (by July 1923-April 1925); sold on April 24, 1925  for 2,000 pounds to Duveen Brothers, London, Paris, New York; sold by Duveen Bothers, Inc., New York (in March 1926 for $130,000)  to Mr. and Mrs. Alfred W. Erickson, New York (March 1926-November 1936); Mrs. Anna E. Erickson, New York (November 1936-February 1961); her estate sale, "The Erickson Collection of Old Master Paintings", Parke-Bernet Galleries, New York, NY, November 15, 1961, no. 8; purchased (for $35,000) by Roy A. Hunt, Pittsburgh (November 1961-October1966); his bequest to Museum, May 1967.

Updated by CGK April 2014
